data.eml:eml: Revision of Paraeupolymnia, and redescription of Nicolea uspiana comb. nov. (Terebellidae: Polychaeta)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Londoño-Mesa, Mario H. (2006): Revision of Paraeupolymnia, and redescription of Nicolea uspiana comb. nov. (Terebellidae: Polychaeta). Zootaxa 1117: 21-35, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.171661
